content: @Quentin Paden something to maybe think about as it's related to OGV, but I've been considering the idea of providing an online geometry conversion service. this might be something you and/or others could help tackle closer to the end of GSoC.
I'm thinking of a simple site where you can upload geometry, specify a desired supported format, and download in that format.

we might want to have them specify the license so we'd know whether to delete it or whether it could be retained. on the backend, we'd hook it up to our GCV geometry conversion framework. that might help put pressure or find contributors for extending it with additional formats too.

@Sean THIS IS A GREAT IDEA!

I would like to work on this as it is related to the OGV backend.
what are the project ideas related to expansion of GCV?
